metadata.title: Doppalf: RAG powered full-stack AI chatbot like ChatGPT
metadata.description: Build a full-stack RAG-powered AI chatbot like ChatGPT to give LLM your personality with Python, FastAPI, Llamaindex, Cohere, Qdrant, Next.js (Typescript), and Tailwind CSS.

metadata.title: Build Blog with Next.js and MDX & Deploy to Github Pages
metadata.description: Create a blog with Next.js as Static Site Generator, MDX for writing content, Github Pages for deploying the static website. Also add SEO and Image optimization.
